original_sentence: dmrs-UplinkForPUSCH-MappingTypeB, dmrs-UplinkForPUSCH-MappingTypeB-DCI-0-2 \\ DMRS configuration for PUSCH transmissions using PUSCH mapping type B (chosen dynamically via PUSCH-TimeDomainResourceAllocation). Only the fields dmrs-Type, dmrs-AdditionalPosition and maxLength may be set differently for mapping type A and B. The field dmrs-UplinkForPUSCH-MappingTypeB applies to DCI format 0_1 and the field dmrs-UplinkForPUSCH-MappingTypeB-DCI-0-2 applies to DCI format \( 0 \_2 \) (see TS 38.212 [17], clause 7.3.1).
